testcase.name: Successful Login - Example #1.1

testcase.name: Unsuccessful Login (Invalid Credentials)

testcase.name: Unsuccessful Login (Empty Fields)
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user leaves the username and password fields empty.................passed And clicks the Login button.................................................passed Then the user should see a message indicating that fields are required......passed

testcase.name: Password Reset
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user clicks the Forgot Password link...............................passed Then the user should be redirected to the password reset page...............passed And the user should see a form for resetting the password...................passed

testcase.name: Successful User Registration
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the registration page..................................passed When the user fills in the registration form with valid mandatory information.passed And click the privacy policy check box......................................passed And clicks the continue button..............................................passed Then the user should see a confirmation message.............................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful User Registration (Invalid Data)
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the registration page..................................passed When the user fills in the registration form with invalid mandatory information.passed And click the privacy policy check box......................................passed And clicks the continue button..............................................passed Then the user should see an invalid error message...........................passed

testcase.name: User Searches for a valid product
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Home page..............................................passed When User enters the valid product "iphone" in the search field.............passed And User clicks on the search button........................................passed Then User should get valid product displayed in search result...............passed

testcase.name: User Searches for a invalid product
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Home page..............................................passed When User enters the invalid product "Honda" in the search field............passed And User clicks on the search button........................................passed Then User should get message as no product matching.........................passed

testcase.name: User Searches without any product
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Home page..............................................passed When User dont enter any product in the search field........................passed And User clicks on the search button........................................passed Then User should get message as no product matching.........................passed
